程序包 cn.edu.whut.sept.zuul.Players

类 Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.whut.sept.zuul.Players.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The Player class represents a player in the game.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      Player()
      Constructs a new Player object.
      Player​(java.lang.String name)
      初始化player
      Player​(java.lang.String name, int health, int weight, java.lang.String roomName, Items items)
      Constructs a new Player object with the specified parameters.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明

      Adds an item to the player's inventory.
      void deleteItem​(java.lang.String itemName)
      Deletes an item from the player's inventory.

      Returns the health of the player.
      Items getItems()
      Returns the items the player is holding.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the player.

      Returns the name of the room the player is in.

      Returns the carrying weight limit of the player.

      Sets the health of the player.

      Sets the items the player is holding.

      Sets the name of the player.

      Sets the name of the room the player is in.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Player

        public Player()
        Constructs a new Player object.

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name)
        初始化player
        参数:
        name - 初始化一个名为name的player

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name,
              int health,
              int weight,
              java.lang.String roomName,
              Items items)
        Constructs a new Player object with the specified parameters.
        参数:
        name - The name of the player.
        health - The health of the player.
        weight - The carrying weight limit of the player.
        roomName - The name of the room the player is in.
        items - The items the player is holding.

      • addItem

        public boolean addItem​(Item item)
        Adds an item to the player's inventory.
        参数:
        item - The item to add.
        返回:
        成功添加返回true，否则返回false

      • deleteItem

        public void deleteItem​(java.lang.String itemName)
        Deletes an item from the player's inventory.
        参数:
        itemName - The name of the item to delete.

      • getItems

        public Items getItems()
        Returns the items the player is holding.
        返回:
        The items the player is holding.
